edge_1: In this movie, Rajendranath Zutshi played the role of Millionaire show producer and Irrfan Khan played the role of Police Inspector. The characters are related as the police department sometimes works in collaboration with wealthy individuals to catch criminals.
edge_2: In this movie, Irrfan Khan played the role of Police Inspector and Saurabh Shukla played the role of Police Constable Srinivas. Both characters work in the police department.
edge_3: Saurabh Shukla portrays Police Constable Srinivas.
